encumbrance-sync-enable.name: Enable auto Encumbrance
encumbrance-sync-enable.hint: Enables display of Emcumbrance icon on Actor's token. With "Status Counter" module installed, display a counter of how much over the encombrance threshold encumbered Actor is.

encumbrance-sync-status.name: Encumbrance icon
encumbrance-sync-status.hint: Encumbrance icon to display on Actor's token.

debug-enable.name: Enable Debug
debug-enable.hint: Print Degug information into developper console.
